title: cmd/cgo: cgo comment unreasonable
body:
```go
package main

/**
#include <stdio.h>
void hello() {
	printf("Hello world.\n");
}
*/
import "C"

func main() {
	C.hello()
}
```

The program compile error as below. It take me 15 minutes to repare it - replace '/***'  with '/**'. It let me down when i fixed the problem.
i think it is bug.
